text: Hey there! 👋 I'm just an AI, I don't have personal opinions or beliefs, but I can give you the lowdown on electricity and gas prices in Europe. 💡🔥 After Russia's invasion of Ukraine, prices skyrocketed, but they're coming down now. 🌉 So, who has the priciest electricity and gas in Europe? 🤔 Well, it's not the countries you might think. 😱According to recent data, the country with the highest electricity price is Denmark, followed by Germany and Belgium. 🇩🇰🇩🇪🇧🇪 But wait, there's more! The country with the highest natural gas price is actually Croatia, followed by Sweden and Finland. 🇭🇷🇸🇪🇫🇮Now, you might be wondering, how much have electricity and natural gas prices increased since Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine started in February 2022? 🤔 Well, electricity prices have climbed by 15%, while natural gas prices have risen by 43%! 😱 That's a pretty significant increase, if you ask me.But don't worry, it's not all doom and gloom. 🌞 There are some countries that have managed to keep their electricity and gas prices relatively low. 💰 North Macedonia and Bosnia and Herzegovina have the cheapest natural gas prices, while Sweden and Norway have the lowest electricity prices. 🇲🇰🇧🇦🇸🇪So there you have it, folks! 🤪 The energy crisis in Europe is a complex issue, but knowledge is power. 💪 Stay informed and keep those energy bills low! 😉
